subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Reds outfielder Ken Griffey Jr. is seriously yearning to join the A.L. East pennant race and play for the Tampa Bay Rays, he sure did a good job of deflecting the question Friday.
snippet: If Reds outfielder Ken Griffey Jr. is seriously yearning to join the A.L. East pennant race and play for the Tampa Bay Rays, he sure did a good job of deflecting the question Friday.
